{T}, Discard a card: Create two tapped Junk tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice three artifacts: Add {R}{R}{R}. Exile target noncreature card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy. [i](You still pay its costs, and may use the added mana to do so.)[/i]
